name: Latvijas Tirgotāju asociācija
goal:
Veidot uzņēmējdarbībai labvēlīgu vidi
Ieviest ilgtspējīgas attīstības principus
Atbalstīt starptautisko tirdzniecību
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
